pr_title: Use Apache Commons in GeoJsonParser; Fix GeoJsonExtent

timeline.message:
Update GeoJsonParser

This change includes minor improvements to the GeoJsonParser and Json
Extent model object:

- Use Apache Commons for reading in the JSON source
- Fix an error in the Json Extent's handling of coordinates--coordinates
  are nested one more array deep in the GeoJson source than I originally
  accounted for, leading to errors.

timeline.bodyText: Nit: Please extract Charset to constant.
timeline.author: gino-m

timeline.message: Merge branch 'offline-area-support' of https://github.com/google/ground-android into json-p
Make JSON source charset a constant
